title: Bedcover, 1800–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: patchwork of printed and unprinted plain weave fabric
markings:
"W..", "..YOMING" in gold
"..ON", "..RAFT", "FIN..". "36yds", and "Long cl.." in blue
inscribed: handwriting in ink on sewn on label "Made by Martha Brownlie born 1 Nov. 1801   Mother of Mary Brownlie Meloy
description: Large, unquilted patchwork cover with bands of printed cotton in "flying geese" pattern alternate with plain wite cloth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 1800–50.
1800–50. Medium: cotton
Technique: patchwork of printed and unprinted plain weave fabric. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-383.
